overview: While the Republic of Korea bares trust, there is a man who prayed with tears for the pain of the people who lost their country in a history of fetters. There is a big tree in the middle of the fields in the history of Christianity. The greatest grown-up of this society, the fence of the isolated people, and the greatest giant of this generation, the late Father Han Kyung-jik lived his life as the last spokesperson.  We follow the 98 years of his journey.
title: Han Kyung-jik
